sentence: What does johnny depp say when cutting down trees? timbuuuuuuuurton

sentence: What do you call a good for nothing vegetable a deadbeet
explanation: A beet is a root vegetable commonly used in salads and cooking

sentence: Why does the little mermaid wear sea shells? because she doesnt fit into b shells
